headline: General Dynamics Stock Falls Despite Earnings Beat
summary: General Dynamics’  earnings report was good, but not good enough to send the stock higher.  “We continue to see steady growth and improvement in operating performance across the defense portfolio,” said CEO Phebe Novakovic in a news release.  Shares climbed in premarket trading, but fell during the day, closing at $265.73, down 3.3%, while the S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 1.7% and 1.1%, respectively.

headline: General Dynamics' Q1 Earnings Beat Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: GD's first-quarter earnings beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 5.5%. Its top line increases 13.9% from the year-ago quarter.

headline: General Dynamics Stock Falls, Despite Earnings Beat
summary: After a tough day for defense investors,  General Dynamics’  earnings report was good, but not good enough to send the stock higher.  “We continue to see steady growth and improvement in operating performance across the defense portfolio,” said CEO Phebe Novakovic in a news release.  Shares climbed in premarket trading, but fell after the open, leaving them down 2% at $269.29 apiece, while the  and  were up 3% and 2.5%, respectively.

Shares climbed in premarket trading, but fell after the open, leaving them down 2% at $269.29 apiece, while the  and  were up 3% and 2.5%, respectively.

headline: General Dynamics (NYSE:GD) Exceeds Q1 Expectations
summary: Aerospace and defense company General Dynamics (NYSE:GD) reported Q1 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 13.9% year on year to $12.22 billion. Its GAAP profit of $3.66 per share was 5.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: General Dynamics Reports First-Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: General Dynamics (NYSE: GD) today reported first-quarter 2025 operating earnings of $1.3 billion, or $3.66 per diluted share (EPS), on revenue of $12.2 billion. Compared with the year-ago quarter, operating earnings increased 22.4%, diluted EPS increased 27.1%, and revenue increased 13.9%. Operating margin of 10.4% was a 70-basis-point expansion from the year-ago quarter.

Operating margin of 10.4% was a 70-basis-point expansion from the year-ago quarter.
